1. This `first tutorial`_ displays transmorph's basic features, and shows
   how tuning the weighting strategy can deal with the issue of dataset
   unbalance.

1. Start discovering the basics of transmorph through a `first tutorial`_,
   in which you will learn how to tune the weighting strategy parameter
   in order to deal with dataset unbalance.
